Scourge skulked along the halls even as the other sweeps, searching 
rooms =
and corridors with weapons drawn. They are silent and deadly, 
trained hunt=
er terminators their optic sensors have no trouble 
penetrating the darknes=
s emptiness of the ship. Their audio sensors 
capturing the smallest sound =
and whisper that echoed through. 

Scourge fretted about the fact that as c=
lose as he was to his quarry, 
he still could not break through the interfe=
rence that hid his prey 
from him. 

> ::Dark Rodimus::
>  
> Rodimus unplu=
gs from the pod.
>  
> Rodimus: I'll try. The CO's "Ready Room" should be n=
ear the bridge.
>  
> Rodimus draws his weapons and heads out into the hall=
way. He is in
> route to the office.

Scourge froze as he thought he heard =
a slight noise coming from ahead 
of him in the corridor, on the way toward=
s the bridge. With a motion 
he commanded the single sweep with him to halt=
. ((OOC: the other 
sweeps are around the ship)). 

Slyly peering around th=
e corner Scourge could see the form of Rodimus 
walking ahead of them, furt=
her along, also on his way towards the 
bridge. 

With a slight smile Scour=
ge lifted his weapon and targeted Rodimus as 
a single red targeting laser =
`painted' Rodimus' back . . . 

Preston
(Scourge & Sweeps)
